pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык/Russian: all aspects
pro_course_detail.description:
You are still considering the Russian grammar is difficult? No problems! I will easily explain everything you do not understand.
Do you want to speak Russian like a native speaker? Let's work on your pronunciation! I will teach you how to pronounce Russian sounds correctly, give tips and lifehacks to improve your pronunciation!
Are you excited about knowing a lot of words? We will talk a lot with you, read texts and watch videos, listen to Russian music. Have you heard that the Russian language is great and mighty? It's time to make sure of this and make your vocabulary rich!

Всё ещё думаете, что русская грамматика трудная? Не беда! Я доступно объясню всё, что вы не понимаете.
Хотите говорить как носитель русского языка? Давайте работать над вашим произношением! Я научу вас правильно произносить русские звуки, дам советы и лайфхаки по улучшению вашего произношения!
Хотите знать много слов? Мы будем много говорить с вами, мы будем читать тексты и смотреть видео, слушать русскую музыку. Пришло время сделать словарный запас богатым! Вы же слышали, что русский язык великий и могучий? Пришло время в этом убедиться!

Do you want to speak Russian like a native speaker? Let's work on your pronunciation! I will teach you how to pronounce Russian sounds correctly, give tips and lifehacks to improve your pronunciation!

pro_course_detail.title: Подготовка к экзамену ТРКИ/Preparation for Russian state exams/Exams
pro_course_detail.description:
So, you are brave and want to take the state test, then do not waste your time, let's get started! I will introduce you to the Russian testing system. I will explain the difficulties, give useful tips and excellent materials for preparation!
This is classes that will help you to prepare successfully for your Russian state exam: speaking,  listening, reading, and writing test. Students receive the following: assessment, classes with professional materials,  homework, grammar correction guide, and a language learning plan.

А если вы смелые и хотите сдавать государственный тест трки, тогда не теряйте время, давайте готовиться! Я познакомлю вас с российской системой тестирования. Объясню трудности, дам полезные советы и отличные материалы для подготовки!
Я предлагаю занятия, которые помогут вам успешно подготовиться к государственному экзамену по русскому языку: устная речь, аудирование, чтение и письмо. Студенты получают следующее: оценка, профессиональные материалы, домашнее задание, план изучения языка.

course_info.trial_description:
Hello everyone. My name is Tatiana.
I am a professional teacher of Russian language and literature with more than 19 years of experience. I have a master's degree and I am a fully qualified teacher of Russian as a foreign language.
My lessons include:
1 Expert lesson plans and materials.
2 Individual approach to your needs and goals.
3 Fun and engaging lessons.
4 Support in overcoming the block in speaking.
5 I can also effectively prepare you for the Russian language certificate "TRKI" needed for studding working or getting residence permits in Russia.
I use modern teaching method that helps students not just to learn Russian, but to comprehend Russia with its culture and traditions.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language for children 5-18 years old (A0-B2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Your child lives abroad, not in Russia (outside the linguistic environment).

I teach Russian to children, including bilinguals.

I have 3 programs:
Russian from scratch for children 6-10 years old.
Russian for unbalanced bilinguals (grammatical base is partially missing) 5-10 years.
Russian for balanced bilinguals (they communicate in Russian without mistakes, as native speakers) 5-18 years old.

Lessons for children are held in a playful, conversational form, there is writing, a little reading, and developing interactive materials.

For children who are just starting to learn the Russian language, I give a strictly regulated amount of information, built on the principle from simple to complex. Basic knowledge is slowly building up. New vocabulary is given strictly on the basis of the material covered. I don’t give authentic materials (poems, songs for Russian-speaking children).

For unbalanced bilinguals, I replenish knowledge in vocabulary and grammar, correct mistakes that have become entrenched in speech, focus on developing speech and expanding vocabulary.

For balanced bilinguals, training also takes place with the expansion of vocabulary, but here we are working more on spelling and punctuation.

If you have additional questions - ask me.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Russian (A0-B2). Grammar, phonetics, verbs.
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you planning to study Russian? Or are you already studying it?

We can go through the entire course with you or work on individual topics (grammar, phonetics, verbs of movement, the perfect and imperfect form of the verb, cases).

Write to me what interests you and I will select the appropriate material.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for businessmen A0-C1. Tourism employees (A0-B2). Tourists (A1-A2).
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you interested in professional business vocabulary in Russian?

I teach Russian for businessmen from A0 to B2 level.

My lessons include vocabulary, audio, writing, grammar and dialogues. I also focus on business etiquette and business writing style.

For the B1-B2 level, we can additionally study the topics of economics, international trade and management in Russian.

Ask for topics that interest you.

Do you work in the service sector (hotel, restaurant), dealing with Russian tourists?

I will teach you the necessary vocabulary in communication. We will practice grammar and pronunciation. We will use stylistically correct phrases.

Are you going on vacation to Russia?

I can teach you the necessary phrases, I will give you a minimum of vocabulary and grammar, and we will work them out in communicative dialogues. You will be able to keep minimal dialogue with the residents of Russia, understand information in Russian.

If you are interested in specific topics, please contact me.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Linguistic. Regional studies. Literature. Russian movies. For А2+ - С2 levels.
Writing and editing essay/commercial texts in Russian without booking a lesson
pro_course_detail.description:
Also assistance in writing and editing commercial texts in Russian. 
You book a lesson, send the text.
I am sending you the edited version. I am an accredited philologist, teacher, copywriter and commercial editor.

pro_course_detail.title: TORFL (ТРКИ) - test consultations of Russian as a Foreign Language А1-С1
pro_course_detail.description:
I am preparing for testing TORFL at levels A2-C1 for all types of speech activity: reading, speaking, listening, writing.

Do you need a TORFL certificate?

The basic level (ТБУ) / A2 is the minimum base for engaging in any professional activity in a limited amount. TBU is the minimum level of knowledge of the Russian language required to become a citizen of the Russian Federation.

First level (ТРКИ-I) / B1. A certificate of this level is required for admission to a Russian higher education institution.

Second level (ТРКИ-II) / B2. Language proficiency at this level allows a person to conduct professional activities in Russian as a specialist in engineering, technical, humanitarian and natural science fields. This certificate is required to obtain a bachelor's or master's degree in Russia.

The third level (ТРКИ-III) / C1 allows you to conduct professional activities in Russian as a philologist, translator, editor, journalist, diplomat, manager working in a Russian-speaking team.

I will analyze your practice tests and help you develop the necessary knowledge and language skills.

Feel free to contact me.

teacher_info.intro:
I'm just a regular person with love for cats, languages, traveling and movies. I'm here to become your language friend, who you can rely on! I am currently living in Seoul to study Korean at university. 

I believe that learning languages is not only a way to learn more about new culture, but also a chance to be able to try to understand the way people think and be connected to people in a different part of the world.

I've lived in different parts of Russia (Saint Petersburg, Siberia and South of Russia), so I can also tell you about different lifestyles! I have a lot of knowledge about Russian history and literature, so you can ask questions about these topics. 

Nice to meet you! :)
teacher_info.short_signature: Practice conversations in Russian while discussing everyday life, news, literature and more!
teacher_info.about_me:
I'm just a regular person with love for cats, languages, traveling and movies. I'm here to become your language friend, who you can rely on! I am currently living in Seoul to study Korean at university. 

I believe that learning languages is not only a way to learn more about new culture, but also a chance to be able to try to understand the way people think and be connected to people in a different part of the world.

I've lived in different parts of Russia (Saint Petersburg, Siberia and South of Russia), so I can also tell you about different lifestyles! I have a lot of knowledge about Russian history and literature, so you can ask questions about these topics. 

Nice to meet you! :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I used to be an English tutor for school students for 4 years, and I help my friends who are learning Russian, that's why I know I love teaching. I'm also very friendly and can talk about almost every theme.

When learning a language, I believe it is important to make mistakes. That's why I always hear my students out and only then make corrections. My goal is to make you comfortable speaking Russian, so I will keep friendly atmosphere, but always make sure you speak in Russian as much as you can.
I put a lot of efforts into creating lessons and feedback, that's why it's going to be helpful. I have a lot of stories to tell and I'm eager to listen to yours. I'm sure our classes will be fun!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I don't have a specific book for all of my classes, however, I have a wide range of materials depending on your level and interests. With my students, we have casual conversations, learn fixed expressions and proverbs, discuss news, read books and poems (both level-adapted and authentic writers). We can also dig into grammar and discuss different ways of diversifying your speech with different constructions. 
I always want to use as much Russian as possible, that's why I do not give translaitons for words right away, but explain in Russian, use body language or show pictures. I also love explainig word origins so students will find it easier to remember many words.

course_info.trial_description:
During this lesson we will focus on your goals in learning and level of Russian. 
I will do my best to figure out what's the best learning style for you!

Feel free to ask any questions!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian +Grammar help
pro_course_detail.description:
Choose a Topic / Free Talking

Hello! I want to hear you speaking, so I will ask questions and you will answer them. Do not be afraid, I will help you and correct your mistakes. This class will be fun and helpful! You can ask for any topics you want to cover during the class, or I will just create a lesson suitable for your level and interests. 

After each class you will have feedback, new words and phrases and self-learning materials. In this way you can improve not only fluency but also accuracy.

Despite this being a conversational class, the lessons are suitable for beginners too. Regardless of your level, we will focus on those grammar structures and vocabulary that will help you speak more freely in Russian! 

Don't hesitate messaging me if you have any questions about the content of my lessons, or with any other question!

pro_course_detail.title: Reading and Writing
pro_course_detail.description:
Choose this class if you want to master you Russian writing and reading skills!

At this class we will read and write in Russian! 

I'm sure, you already know that reading is one of the best way to increase your fluency. You can pick any material you're interested in. During the classes you will  read out loud, learn new words and grammar patterns. After reading, we will discuss it. We can read about everything, from texts from study books to classic literature.

If you are interested in writing, we can discuss and correct any written text you'll prepare for the class, as well as look at different forms of writing in Russian, learn more about punctuation and tools to persuade, describe and improve your writing skills.

You can pick whether you want to focus on one skill, or practice both of them with me. This way you will improve your pronunciation, build up vocabulary and practice writing. 

This class will be useful to Intermediate learners+, but you can book it even if you're beginner. Then I will pick easier material for you. I hope to see you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice / Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
What you will learn: understand Russian speech, master new words, learn to speak Russian, learn about Russian culture. During these sessions, we will work to improve your vocabulary, speaking and listening skills. Classes of this format are always interesting and exciting. We can easily find a topic for conversation (movies, music, books, life stories, hobbies, etc.) With the help of such activities, you can very quickly get used to the Russian speech and easily apply it in everyday life.

Чему Вы научитесь: понимать русскую речь, освоите новые слова, научитесь говорить по-русски, узнаете о русской культуре. Во время этих занятий мы будем работать над улучшением вашего словарного запаса, разговорных навыков и аудирования.  Занятия такого формата всегда интересные и увлекательные. С легкостью найдем тему для разговора (кино, музыка, книги, жизненные истории, хобби и т.д.) С помощью таких занятий очень быстро можно привыкнуть к русской речи и без проблем применять ее в повседневной жизни.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners / Русский язык для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
What you will learn: basic grammar rules, reading, pronunciation, speaking practice. This lesson is suitable for any level of language proficiency. In the classroom, we read texts, listen to audio, watch videos and communicate on interesting topics. You can feel the result after the first lesson. Waiting for you!

Чему Вы научитесь: основные правила грамматики, чтение, произношение, разговорная практика. Данный урок подойдет для любого уровня владения языком. teacher_info.intro: My name is Yauhen, I come from Belarus, but at the moment I live in Vilnius, Lithuania. I am passionate about languages, literature, gaming, music and, most importantly, learning about other cultures and telling about mine!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been teaching for 3 years as both a hobby and as an additional source of income. I teach both Belarusian and Russian, since they are both my mother tongues. 
I am very patient, reasonably forgiving and easy to negotiate with, the only thing I would ask is for you to be open about your wishes and concerns. It is very important for me to see my students genuinely achieve success in the end! I do not scold anyone for not doing homework or not revising in-between the lessons, because I believe those activities to be the students' responsibility.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I prefer to adapt my lessons to the needs of my students, so if you want to put a bigger emphasis on a certain aspect of language learning, just ask! I prefer using real life examples to develop your skills, but sometimes I use textbook materials too.
Note that I do not help with preparing for tests and exams as I am not qualified enough for this and I also do not work with children!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello :)
I am an English teacher, who adores both teaching and learning languages.
Teaching exposes me to a world of different nations, cultures and the greatest diversity of personalities. I love teaching because sharing my knowledge with others is very rewarding.
Nowadays learning a language is no longer seen as being learnt through mechanical exercises, it's developed through students interacting and engaging and how said Federico Fellini " A different language is a different vision of life".
Let's discover languages together :)
See you!
teacher_info.introduction: A different language is a different vision of life (Federico Fellini).I really like languages since my childhood. I both like teaching and learning languages.Now I am currently learning Italian. Short about me. I am a person with multiple interests and have always been thinking of making a career, becoming a successful person and generally finding my way in the mad mad mad mad world.So I would like to use my gained knowledge and experience in order to teach and be helpful to everyone.Besides languages, I love reading, music, cinema, sports(I like such kind of sports that upgrade strength, reaction and flexibility; for ex. tennis, swimming and chess).Cinema is my passion. Every year I do not miss the opportunity to be part of Golden Apricot International Film Festival. In that way, I have met lots of directors, actors and actresses such as: Wim Wenders, Nastassja Kinski, Kim Ki-duk, Ornella Muty, Sergey Solovyev, Roman Balayan, Atom Egoyan, Hugh Hudson and many others). Short but interesting information about my native language. Armenian language forms a separate branch of Indo-European language family. It also has its own and unique alphabet. The Armenian language is one of the oldest languages in the world.It may seem a bit difficult but if there is interest you can overcome all difficulties with pleasure., because everything is possible. :) Conclusion: Some words about my lesson plan. If you are good at teaching unplanned lessons, you will be better teaching with a productive plan. So lesson plan plays its important role in teaching. Without each other the process can not be complete and productive. Making an effective lesson plan takes time, diligence and understanding of students' goals and abilities. The goal as with all teaching is to motivate the students to take what you are teaching and retain as much as possible. Let's learn languages together and at the same time discover lots of interesting things. Feel free to contact me and join my classes! See you!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello :)
I am an English teacher, who adores both teaching and learning languages.
Teaching exposes me to a world of different nations, cultures and the greatest diversity of personalities. I love teaching because sharing my knowledge with others is very rewarding.
Nowadays learning a language is no longer seen as being learnt through mechanical exercises, it's developed through students interacting and engaging and how said Federico Fellini " A different language is a different vision of life".
Let's discover languages together :)
See you!
teacher_info.about_teacher: More than one person has told me that becoming an English teacher was a bad career choice. However, my decision to become an English teacher was not based on the job marque, but on where I think I best fit in the grand scheme of things. If language is at the heart of everything we do, then I want to be in the middle of the action, helping others learn to use language well.We need to analyze and evaluate the information using strategic and extended thinking; this leads to creating a point of view on a topic. My goal as a teacher is to ensure my students have the skills they’ll need to make informed and logical decisions that benefit themselves and their community.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Great teachers are nimble, observant, and responsive, always keeping an open mind about how to best engage their students and get them excited about learning—and that means considering trying out different interactive teaching styles.
My methods include these characteristics:
Encourage student participation.
Use questions that stimulate response, discussion, and a hands-on experience.
Use teaching aids that press for answers, and capture/hold the student’s attention.
Set up a work group environment.
Involve yourself as well as the student.

teacher_info.teaching_style:

Communication is key to a successful learning so I use all kinds of different resources to help you express your thoughts and emotions in your target language.

pro_course_detail.description:
Hi!
Yeni başlayanlar öğrenciler için İngilizce dersleri veriyorum. Derslerimde alfabe, seslı harfler modelleri, vurgu, dil bılgisi ve yeni kelımeleri anlatıyorum. Deneme ders`te seviyenıze bakıyorum. Deneme ders`ten sonra sizin için ders programı hazırlıyorum. 
Английский язык для ничинающих и уже отчаявшихся его выучить! :) Приглашаю вас на пробный урок после которого я посмотрю на ваш уровень владения языком и составлю для вас подходящую программу уроков.
If you want to start learning English join my lessons, we will make up a lesson program after a trial lesson. Even if you think that learning English is impossible, I will show you it is not :))

pro_course_detail.title: Турецкий (для старых учеников)
pro_course_detail.description: Merhaba! Dear students, I offers Turkish lessons for beginners, since it is not my native language but I also learnt it myself I know well how to explain  rules ot make it easier for foreigners to understand some grammar and vocabulary, We will make up a programme according ro  your wishes.

teacher_info.intro: I am 24 years old. Currently studying abroad, more precisely in the Czech Republic. I enjoy many things: literature, philosophy, linguistics, art, music, water engineering and Russian culture. And I love to meet new people and learn about different cultures. I'm hoping we will have a pleasant conversation!
teacher_info.about_me: I am 24 years old. Currently studying abroad, more precisely in the Czech Republic. I enjoy many things: literature, philosophy, linguistics, art, music, water engineering and Russian culture. And I love to meet new people and learn about different cultures. I'm hoping we will have a pleasant conversation!
teacher_info.about_teacher: Linguistics and language learning were my interests for a long time now and I had the experience of learning the language to the point of being able not only to communicate with people but to study and write scientific works in the language. So I do understand the needs of a wide variety of students. Language tests, job interviews, writing assignments, you name it — I will be able to effectively help you because of my own experience.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are flexible. If you are the type who doesn't like to come up with the topics to speak on, I will ask a lot of questions. If you want to expand your vocabulary in a certain field, we will take up your course. Aside from nonchalantly talking, which is very important, we will exercise in pronunciation and grammar in order to eradicate any kind of unwanted mistakes. Plus I will acquaint you with nuances of the words you are going to learn, so you would know how and when to use them. Looking forward to hearing from you!

course_info.trial_description: Пробный урок для того, чтобы мы определили ваш уровень знания языка и обсудили планы на будущие уроки. Trial lesson is here so we can determine you language level and discuss the plans on the future lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Базовый разговорный русский язык / Basic Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Мы будем учиться говорить просто и без ошибок. Будем использовать те знания, которые у вас уже есть, и получим новые. Я обещаю, что каждый урок вы, кроме практики разговорного языка, узнаете что-то новое. Урок может быть на EN, CZ, RU. Конечно, я буду настаивать на проведении урока на русском. Содержание этих уроков будет заточено индивидуально под вас: это может быть только разговор, а могут быть упражнения. 
Надеюсь с вами увидеться на занятии!

We will be learning how to speak simply and without mistakes. We will use your current knowledge of the language and acquire some new. I promise that every lesson you will learn something new, aside from the mere practice. The lesson may be carried out in EN, CZ or RU. I insist though that we will do it in Russian. The lessons are tailored individually: it may be a simple conversation practice or exercises. 
Hope to see you soon on the lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский язык / Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Главное — чтобы было интересно! Мы будем повышать вашу уверенность в разговоре и будем сосредотачиваться на определенном словарном запасе, который подходит вам: мы можем обсуждать искусство, историю, инженерное дело и так далее. Цель этих уроков — научить вас использовать русский язык в жизненных ситуациях. 
Надеюсь, что мы увидимся на уроках. 

Most importantly — it should be interesting! We will build your confidence in conversation and focus on a certain vocabulary, which may suit you: we can talk about art, history, engineering and so on. The goal of this lesson is to teach you to use the language in real situations.
Hope to see you on the lesson!

teacher_info.intro:
I live in the USA. I speak English and Russian fluently.
I have been teaching for many years. I like sharing my knowledge and experience.
I'm really interested in the achievements of my students and in the improving of their language skills.
I dedicate my free time to reading and listening to music in different languages.
Я живу в США. Я говорю на английском и русском языках.
Я преподаю много лет. Мне нравится делиться своими знаниями и опытом.
Я действительно заинтересована в достижениях моих студентов и в улучшении их языковых навыков.
Своё свободное время я посвящаю чтению и музыке на разных языках.
teacher_info.about_me:
I live in the USA. I speak English and Russian fluently.
I have been teaching for many years. I like sharing my knowledge and experience.
I'm really interested in the achievements of my students and in the improving of their language skills.
I dedicate my free time to reading and listening to music in different languages.
Я живу в США. Я говорю на английском и русском языках.
Я преподаю много лет. Мне нравится делиться своими знаниями и опытом.
Я действительно заинтересована в достижениях моих студентов и в улучшении их языковых навыков.
Своё свободное время я посвящаю чтению и музыке на разных языках.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I teach English and Russian to children and adults from Beginner to Upper-Intermediate level. I can not just teach you some useful grammar and vocabulary but also share with you my knowledge of modern English and Russian, cultural features, some slang. So you’ll be engaged in the everyday “lively” language. 
Я преподаю английский и русский язык взрослым и детям от начального до продвинутого уровня. Я могу не только научить Вас необходимой грамматике и расширить словарный запас, но и поделиться спецификой современного языка, культурными особенностями и дать представление о сленге. Так Вы будете вовлечены в повседневный "живой" язык.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
If you would like to make your lessons more lively and entertaining we can discuss movies, TV shows, TED videos, articles, learn lyrics from your favorite songs and just have fun! After just a few classes you can feel more confident in using English or Russian and you will see how it becomes a part of your lifestyle.
Если Вы хотите разнообразить уроки и сделать их более живыми, мы можем обсуждать фильмы, тв-шоу, статьи, учить тексты Ваших любимых песен и просто наслаждаться процессом обучения! Буквально после нескольких занятий вы будете чувствовать себя более уверенными в использовании английского или русского языка и увидите как он станет частью Вашего образа жизни.

course_info.trial_description:
At the trial lesson we will get to know each other.
I will assess your English level and give you recommendations.
We will discuss our plans for studying based on your goals and select the material to improve your skills. 
На пробном занятии мы познакомимся, я оценю Ваш уровень знаний и дам рекомендации.
Мы обсудим планы занятий, исходя из Ваших целей. А также подберём подходящий материал для улучшения Ваших навыков.

pro_course_detail.title: Everyday modern English / Повседневный современный английский
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to know the heart of everyday modern English? Do you want to avoid learning outdated phrases from textbooks? Do you want to expand your vocabulary? Do you finally want to sound like a native? Welcome to my classes!
Хотите узнать особенности современного повседневного английского? Хотите избежать изучения устаревших фраз из учебников? Хотите расширить свой словарный запас? Хотите наконец звучать как носитель? Добро пожаловать на мои занятия!

pro_course_detail.title: American citizenship interview preparation/ Подготовка к интервью на получение американского гражданства
pro_course_detail.description:
At these classes we prepare for an American citizenship interview. We look through all the commands that can be given and the questions that can be asked.
На занятиях мы готовимся к интервью на получение американского гражданства. Отрабатываем все команды и вопросы, которые могут быть заданы.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS preparation / Подготовка к IELTS
pro_course_detail.description:
I will help you to prepare for the IETLS. I have a lot of reliable and up-to-date material. We will go through everything (Listening, Reading, Writing, Speaking), focusing on the most challenging parts for you.
Я помогу Вам подготовиться к экзамену IELTS. У меня есть много проверенного и обновлённого материала для практики всех частей (аудирования, чтения, письма и говорения). Мы проработаем их все, останавливаясь на заданиях, которые вызывают наибольшее затруднение для Вас.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian/ 会话俄语/ Konversationsrussisch/ Russe conversationnel/ Разговорный русский язык
pro_course_detail.description:
I'll help you to start speaking Russian without problems.
At our classes we will be discussing the topics that are interesting for you.
我會幫助您快速而準確地講俄語。
在課程中，我們將就您感興趣的主題進行交流。
Ich werde Ihnen helfen, schnell und fehlerfrei auf Russisch zu sprechen.
Während des Unterrichts werden wir Sie über Themen informieren, die Sie sich interessieren.
Je vous aiderai à parler russe rapidement et sans erreur.
Pendant les cours, nous communiquerons sur des sujets qui vous intéressent.
Я помогу Вам быстро и без ошибок заговорить на русском языке.
На уроках мы будем общаться на интересные Вам темы.

pro_course_detail.title: GROUP lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
During these classes we work in a group of 2 students, practicing dialogues, discussing different topics, listening to each other's opinion and having fun together.
На занятиях мы работаем в группе с 2 студентами. Отрабатываем диалоговую форму, общаемся на разные темы, учимся слушать мнение собеседника и грамотно отвечать.

teacher_info.intro: Я дружелюбная, весёлая и всегда найду тему для разговора. Увлекаюсь теннисом и путешествиями. Побывала в 30 странах мира, а еще обожаю готовить!  Веду свой блог о тонкостях русского языка.
teacher_info.about_me: Я дружелюбная, весёлая и всегда найду тему для разговора. Увлекаюсь теннисом и путешествиями. Побывала в 30 странах мира, а еще обожаю готовить!  Веду свой блог о тонкостях русского языка.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I finished MGU Lomonosova, as a teacher of russian language.  Participate in international forums.
Окончила МГУ Ломоносова по направлению преподаватель РКИ для детей и взрослых. Активно участвую в международных форумах РКИ в качестве спикера и слушателя.  Прошла курс профессиональной переподготовки - учитель русского языка и литературы. 
Опыт работы:
Работала в миграционном центре для детей беженцев с ноября 2020 г. по май 2021 год.
В настоящий момент работаю в дипломатической академии - преподаю русский язык как иностранный детям и взрослым.
Также работала  в общеобразовательной школе учителем русского языка.
Опыт работы репетитором русского языка -  более 5 лет.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Я считаю, что учить языки надо с удовольствием. Поэтому всегда   слушаю пожелания учеников, какие темы они бы хотели изучить поподробнее, что обсудить и что нового узнать.  Обожаю играть на уроках, как со взрослыми так и с детьми. В своей практике  в основном использую учебники "Точка ру", "Поехали" и немного материала из "Дороги в Россию". Все учебники у меня в электронном виде, поэтому никаких дополнительных затрат не потребуется.

course_info.trial_description:
Always glad to see you on my lesson and to know more about you, your interests in russian language. Why do you wanna learn russian language and where do you need it? This information will help me to make our lessons more productive and interesting for you!
Всегда рада вас видеть на моем уроке. Хочу больше узнать о вас. для чего вы учите русский язык? Эта информация поможет мне сделать уроки интересными и полезными для вас! Скучно не будет.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для всех. Russian language for everyone!
pro_course_detail.description:
I am a professional russian teacher. Teaching all levels, and also business language. Have a master degree in economics and law. I have been teaching russian as foreign more then 5 years, prepared a lot of students for such universities as MGU and RUDN, high school of economics. Even on my first lesson you will start to speak russian. I am working with american students now, in American online school, so somedays possible to give lessons at deep night. If you wanna improve your russian skills for communication,   or travelling also glad to help. By the way, my hobby is travelling so i am fond to speak of different cultures and traditions.  
Will be very happy to see you on my lesson!!!!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for children! Русский для детей
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello!! I am a professional teacher of russian language for children. Last 2 years i have been working with children in american schools, before i worked with children that migrated from other countries. And also, with homeless children, who have problems in families.  As i am working with children   at schools, i have all materials, that are made by professional methodists, and that are successfully tested on students.  My lessons are not boring, we always play games, sing songs and  do a lot od activities, even online! Would be very glad to see you on my lesson. 

Всем привет! Я профессиональный  преподаватель русского языка, как иностранного.  Последние 2 года я работаю преподавателем русского как иностранного в американской школе с детьми от 4 до 16 лет. Также работала с детьми мигрантами, и детьми, которые оказались в трудной жизненной ситуации. Так как я работала в разных  школах,  у меня есть все материалы к урокам, которые разработаны профессиональными методистами и проверены на учениках. Мои студенты показывают хорошие результаты:  поступают в школы и лучшие университеты России.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for communication. Русский для общения.
pro_course_detail.description:
If you wanna just communication, without deep and difficult grammar- then this course for you. You will improve your communication  and audio skills.
Хотите общаться на русском легко и просто. Быть понятым и всё понимать? Тогда этот курс для Вас. Никакой сложной грамматики. Только реальные ситуации из жизни и живое общение.  Улучшите свои речевые и аудио навыки.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для делового общения (экономика и юриспруденция)
pro_course_detail.description: На уроках углубленно изучается терминология в сферах экономики или юриспруденции.  Я помогу вам не только с теоретическими знаниями, но и подскажу как это применить на практике. До того, как стать преподавателем русского языка, я работала ведущим экономистом на предприятии. У меня есть соответствующее образование ( магистр экономики и бакалавр юриспруденции).  Программа курса включает деловое общение в разных ситуациях: переговоры, переписка, контакты по телефону, подготовка документов и др.  Также курс подходит для студентов, изучающих теорию в институте.

pro_course_detail.title: Грамматика русского языка
pro_course_detail.description: Курс подходит для студентов, которые готовятся к сдаче  ТРКИ, вступительных и итоговых экзаменов в ВУЗАХ. На уроках разбираем грамматические конструкции, учимся грамотно составлять письма, решаем типовые  тестовые задания, выполняем упражнения на аудирование и чтение. Разговорная практика в пределах субтеста "говорение"

pro_course_detail.title: Russian speaking club  Разговорный клуб.
pro_course_detail.description:
Добро пожаловать в разговорный клуб русского языка (Уровень И1-С1). Мы встречаемся в Zoom  каждый вторник с 21:00 до 22:00.  Стоимость участия - 5$. Вы покупаете сразу 2 урока, которые должны использовать в течение месяца.  Обычно в группе не больше 5 человек, но сейчас лето, время отпусков, и вы можете стать счастливчиком и быть единственным участником клуба.  Мы будем много разговаривать, знакомиться с новыми людьми, читать книги . смотреть фильмы и обсуждать их.  Это будет весело! Присоединяйтесь.  Перед тем как забронировать урок, напишите мне. 
Lessons for speaking club in Zoom for level B1-C1.  We meet every tuesday from 21:00 till 22:00 Moscow time.  1 lesson cost - 5$ (you buy 2 lessons and use them during 1 month).  Usually in group - no more then 5 students, but as it is summer now it could happen that you will be lucky and the only person on the lesson.  On lessons we discuss different topics, read stories, watch videos, play games and then discuss them. It will be fun, join us. Please contact me before booking  lesson.

teacher_info.intro: I am a native Armenian teacher with Master's degree in International relations and diplomacy. I can help you to learn to speak, write and read in Armenian, as well as to improve your conversational skills. I have a flexible schedule.
teacher_info.introduction: I was born and raised in Armenia. I have graduated with honors from Yerevan State University, faculty of International Relations and Diplomacy (Master's degree). I adore languages. I am fluent in English, Russian and French and I can teach you Armenian in all these languages. I have 5 years' experience of working as a translation project manager. We can practice both written and conversational Armenian. I can help with Armenian everybody who is interested in this ancient language.

teacher_info.intro: Hello, I am Vlad and I am a professional tutor of RSL, Mandarin Chinese and English. I am very open and easy going person. I love meeting new people and have a cultural exchange.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified Russian, English and Mandarin Chinese teacher with more than 6 years of  experience
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, I am Vlad and I am a professional tutor of RSL, Mandarin Chinese and English. I am very open and easy going person. I love meeting new people and have a cultural exchange.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have more than 6 years of experience in teaching RSL, Mandarin Chinese and English languages. I usually use a communicative approach of teaching languages. My career started in China in international school, that's why I understand different cultures and moreover I can easily find the right teaching approach for each of my students'. For all my career I had more then 2000 students. Some of them successfully passed international exams in Mandarin and Russian languages.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Nowadays it is hard to find teaching materials, which are good from all the aspects. That’s what I was doing-I was trying to adapt teaching materials of Mandarin Chinese, English and Russian languages for my students, because I do care about them and it is important for me that my students take one hundred and fifty percent of knowledge from my classes and go back home not like after a tedious class, but from something that they want to come back for every time. It is important if student develops himself not only in a way that language requires but develops him or herself from different perspectives.
Book a trial lesson and we can discuss your goals in teaching languages !

Methods and approaches in teaching Russian language to speakers of other languages

course_info.trial_description:
Trial  lesson in Russian lesson is completely unique for every student. It totally depends on learning goals of each student. But for sure trial lesson includes the most common parts:
-reading
-speaking
-writing
-listening

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian language course (A1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is customised for every student according to his/her needs and learning goals from A1 level to C2. The course is build on communicative approach of teaching, it means that the student will be able to feel confident while speaking to Russian people everywhere.
the course consists of several parts:
-reading(reading different stories/articles)
-listening(listening to different audios)
-writing(writing sentences and essays)
-speaking(practicing dialogs and conversational situations)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for business communication
pro_course_detail.description: This course is aimed at entrepreneurs and managers working or planning to do business with Russia, and interested in improving their communication skills in the Russian language.

pro_course_detail.title: General English (A1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
General English course includes 3 important aspects:
-Listening
-Writing
-Speaking
After the course you will be able to speak fluent English. You'll be able to understand people, if they speak to you in English.
After 6 years of teaching languages in international schools, I've learned different teaching approaches. The most effective one is communicative approach. My general English course is build on this approach. Don't waste your time with the boring grammar books. I will help you to learn English in an effective way!

pro_course_detail.description: Книга для изучения РКИ первая часть, комплект включает в себя рабочую тетрадь, книга для ученика. Цены

teacher_info.intro:
I'm Lyubov - Любовь - it means "love" in Russian. So I'm very friendly, funny and easy going))) I like to discuss different everyday topics, such as family, relationships, love, free time. I also love traveling, history. I know the history of my country well. But I'm also very interested in the history of my student's country, the specifics of their life, special traditions. I have a family, my own house, my own business. That's why I have a lot to talk about!
If you want to talk to me about computers, chemistry and math - we will be definitely  bored together!))))
teacher_info.short_signature: Сертифицированный преподаватель Русского языка как иностранного, сертификат МГУ. Высшее педагогическ
teacher_info.introduction: Education: Lipetsk Pedagogical University, Department of French. Experience: English teacher (3 years in public school 2012-2015), a French teacher (one year), a teacher of Russian language (4 years on Itaki.com), I organize cultural and language tours in Lipetsk (Russia ) for foreigners. Philosophy: My lessons are for those who want to learn languages for pleasure, travel orwork. So I use songs, the latest news, movies, historical facts and etc. I believe to learn the language of another country you have to understand its culture, history, how people live, what they believe. In different countries people think in different languages. That's why it's very important to understand people's way of thinkin, if you want to understand their language. If you think that Russian is complicated language, you're right, because my country has a complicated history. The biggest country in the world is situated between two worlds: Europe and Asia. It has absorbed something from each side, but it has retained its unique charm. My respect for you if you decided to learn Russian! As for French, I adore it! It reminds me of the Russian language, because it also has a large amount of words, it is bright, precise, requiring your understanding.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hi! I'm a Russian language techer. I am a native speaker and I live in Russia. I have a pedagogical education. So I know how to make the learning process easier and more interesting. 
I've been teaching Russian for 4 years on Italki. During this time, I have accumulated a lot of experience and teaching materials. I can speak English and I understand in French. Feel free to contact me!
teacher_info.teaching_style: My approach. I use the tutorial + my own presentations with exersiсes, games, pictures, videos. I propose a lot of topics. I like to travel and I understand how difficult to come to an foreign country with no language. Therefore, I created a course for those who want to go to Russia. For foreigners, who live in Russia - everyday vocabulary or Russian for job, or express language training and ets. I enjoy teaching and I prefer unformal, friendly, sincere atmosphere.

cert_info.description: 5 лет обучение преподаванию иностранных языков, зарубежной истории и культуры.

course_info.trial_description:
Давай познакомимся? 
Бронируй пробный урок, чтобы узнать друг друга и обсудить детали обучения. До встречи!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian (work with books, exercises, discussions). Level A2 and upper
pro_course_detail.description:
This common course is good for any levels, except beginners. It includes grammar - presentation of new material, exercises to work out new material, reading, discussion the text, exercises for text, sometimes video and music, and of course practice of Russian. I create every lesson individually for you, it depends on your knowledges and needs.
Покупая пакет, вы получаете полноценный курс на проработку необходимого материала. У меня есть возможность готовиться к урокам с вами заранее и подбирать необходимый обучающий материал. Также вы получаете скидку. А я получаю уверенность в ученике и его намерениях.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Если ты можешь говорить на русском языке и тебе нужна практика общения, бронируй неформальный урок! Поговорим на разные темы :) Обещаю, что не буду перебивать и докучать с исправлениями ошибок ;)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners. Professional individual course
pro_course_detail.description: We use a professional book + my presentations with animation, games and exercises to work out the new material.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian. Reading
pro_course_detail.description: We choose a material that you prefer to read. You read this (book, letters, news, poems and ets.), we correct your pronunciation, discuss rules, we make a list of new words to learn, write some grammar rules if it's needed. Usually , we discuss the text after the reading.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian in real life. Useful topics, dialogues,  speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description: Russian in real life. Useful topics, dialogues,  speaking practice. Русский в реальной жизни. Полезные темы, диалоги, разговорная практика
